Can u sing? Do you think that all the people in the world 
 would listen to you, singing and would stop whatever they 
 were doing for a while and would want to give a thought 
 about the idea that a song tends to? Can u sketch? and can 
 you sketch the face of an idea? Can u act? Do u think a 
 satire can be powerful enough to change the world? Can u 
 dance? Can you prove that the ideas are not captivated but 
 they are free, they are invulnerable? Can you speak and 
 want people to listen to you, while you analyze a picket 
 line? Or, you only want to do your job so that people can 
 forget about life for a while? Its time you hit the streets! 
 After the grand success in the previous year, Avenir is back 
 with Free Wheelin’. 

 We believe that all the art forms are somehow related if 
 they are driven by a particular idea. Out here, we will 
 provide you with a theme/idea/topic, which you have to 
 implicate in your performance. As this whole idea is 
 inspired from 'Nukkads' and street arts, and the radical 

cultural revolution of the sixties, we will provide you with a 
 street corner like atmosphere. No mikes, no amplifiers! 

 This event has two rounds: 

 l Preliminary Round The Winning teams/participants will be 
 eligible for the Final round. 

 l The Final Round – Winning teams of the Prelims and those 
 from Aahvaahan (for students of Netaji Subhash 

 Engineering College students only) will be eligible for this 
 round. 

 RULES and REGULATIONS (same for both the
rounds): 

 l An idea/theme/topic will be provided; participants have to 
 implement that very idea through their performances. 

 l Any form of art is allowed and welcome! People can Sing, sing 
 in groups, play instruments, sketch, paint, speak, act and 
 direct charades (one-act dramas), recite, dance, dance in 
 groups etc. But key point is you have to implement the 
 given theme through whatever you want to do. 
 l People from different institution can team up and 
 participate. All you need is a college ID card. 

 l Offensive languages will lead a participant to 
 disqualification. 

 l Time limit for each performance is 10+1 minutes. 

 l Register yourself / your team and be present at the venue 
 by 10:30 A.M on the day of the event. 

 l Participants, performing in groups, can have maximum 6 
 people in their groups. 

 l No electronic appliances will be allowed/provided viz. 
 mikes, amplifiers, cables, lights, mixers etc. A Street corner 
 like atmosphere will be provided. 

 l For those who will paint / sketch will have to bring their 
 own equipment like pencil, colors, brushes, or crayons etc. 

 l Judges’ decision is final and irrevocable.
